column2: "Asɛm a ofi EWURADZE hɔ baa Jeremia nkyɛn
column3: ber a ɔhen Zedekia somaa Malkija ba Pasur
column4: na ɔsɔfo Maaseia ba Zefania wɔ ne nkyɛn dɛ
column7: bisa EWURADZE hɔ ma hɛn; na Babilɔnhen Nebukadenezar nye hɛn ridzi ako: egyangyanbiara EWURADZE nye hɛn bedzi no dɛ mbrɛ n'anwanwa ndwuma no nyina tse
column8: ma oeefi hɛn do afow akɔ."

column3: Dɛm na hom nkɛka nkyerɛ Zedekia:"

column6: mebɛdan hom nsamu akodze a hom dze nye Babilɔnhen na Kaldeafo a woebotua hom roko
column8: na mobɔboa hɔn ano aba kurow yi ne finimfin."

column2: "Na emi mankasa medze nsa a atsen na basa a ɔyɛ dzen
column5: na enyiber kɛse menye hom bɔko."

column3: nyimpa na mbowa nyina: na ɔyardɔm kɛse bɛma woewuwu."

column7: na hɔn a wɔaka kurow yi mu a woefi ɔyardɔm
column9: na ɔkɔm mu no mahyɛ Babilɔnhen Nebukadenezar nsa
column11: na ɔdze afona anomu ekuku hɔn; ɔrennkam hɔn do

column3: Mbrɛ EWURADZE se nye yi: Hwɛ
column4: medze nkwa no kwan na owu no kwan misi hom enyim."

column5: na ɔyardɔm ano: na nyia obefir edzi na ɔakɔtɔ Kaldeafo a woetwa hom ho mu no
column7: na no nkwa bɛyɛ afonam ama no."

column2: "Na medze m'enyim mesi kurow yi do wɔ mbusu ntsi
column3: na nnyɛ papa ntsi bi a
column4: EWURADZE na ɔse: wɔdze bɛhyɛ Babilɔnhen ne nsa

column5: na hom ngye dza wɔafa no afo no mfi ɔhyɛdofo no ne nsamu amma m'ebufuhyew eemmfir edzi dɛ ogya
column6: na ɔaannhyew mbrɛ obi nntum nndum no
column7: wɔ hom nyɛe no mbusu ntsi."

column5: na asaase tɛtɛr mu botan do e

column7: Woana botum esian aba hɛn do? Anaa woana na ɔbɛba hɛn tsenabea ha?"

column2: "Mebɛtsea hom dɛ mbrɛ hom ndzeyɛɛ no nsowee tse
column3: EWURADZE na ɔse: na mobɔsɔ gya wɔ no kwaa mu ma ɔahyew dza ɔabɔ no ho aprɔw nyinara."
